subScenes.name: 报修发起
subScenes.description: 员工发现电脑故障，联系IT支持

qaPairs.speakerText: Hey, can you help? My laptop's totally frozen.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 嘿，能帮个忙吗？我的笔记本彻底卡死了。

responses.text: Sure, I'm on it. What's the error message?
responses.text_cn: 当然，我马上看。有什么错误提示吗？

responses.text: Oh no, again? Let me check it out.
Got it. Describe the issue.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用口语化表达快速说明故障，避免啰嗦

qaPairs.speakerText: It won't boot up—just shows a black screen after the Apple logo.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 开机不了，苹果标志后就黑屏了。

responses.text: Have you tried holding the power button for 10 seconds?
Yeah, I did. Still nothing.
Okay, I'll schedule a repair.

qaPairs.usageNote: 回应时先问简单排查步骤，体现专业性

subScenes.name: 初步排查
subScenes.description: IT人员指导用户做基础检查

qaPairs.speakerText: Try unplugging it, then press and hold the power button for 15 secs.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 先拔掉电源，再长按电源键15秒。

responses.text: Done. Still black screen. What now?
responses.text_cn: 弄了，还是黑屏。接下来呢？

responses.text: Okay, I'll try that.
No change.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用户需反馈操作结果，便于IT判断故障等级

qaPairs.speakerText: Is the charger light on? Any fan noise?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 充电器灯亮吗？有风扇声吗？

responses.text: Charger's lit, but no fan sound at all.
responses.text_cn: 充电灯亮，但一点风扇声都没有。

responses.text: I think the light's on... wait, let me check.
responses.text_cn: 好像灯亮着…等等，我确认下。

responses.text: Not sure.

qaPairs.usageNote: 回答需具体，避免模糊词如'maybe'或'kinda'

subScenes.name: 确认维修
subScenes.description: IT确认需上门维修并约定时间

qaPairs.speakerText: Looks like a hardware issue. I'll send a tech to your desk.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 看起来是硬件问题，我派技术员去你工位。

responses.text: Can you come this afternoon? I'm in a meeting till 3.
responses.text_cn: 下午能来吗？我3点前都在开会。

responses.text: Sure, afternoon works.
Thanks! How long will it take?

qaPairs.usageNote: 主动提出可用时间段，提高沟通效率

qaPairs.speakerText: Tech will be there at 3:30. Should take under an hour.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 技术员3点半到，一小时内能搞定。

responses.text: Perfect, I'll be here. Thanks a lot!
responses.text_cn: 太好了，我等你，太感谢了！

responses.text: Got it. I'll leave the laptop on the desk.
Alright.

qaPairs.usageNote: 确认时间后需表达感谢或说明准备动作

subScenes.name: 结束道别
subScenes.description: 对话自然结束，保持礼貌

qaPairs.speakerText: Alright, I'll update you if anything changes.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 好的，有变化我会再通知你。

responses.text: Appreciate it! Have a good one!
Thanks, see you at 3:30.
Cool.

qaPairs.usageNote: 结尾用简短感谢或确认时间收尾最自然

qaPairs.speakerText: No problem—hope it gets fixed quick!

responses.text: Me too. I've got a deadline today!
responses.text_cn: 我也是，我今天有截止日期！

responses.text: Thanks for helping!
Alright, bye!

qaPairs.usageNote: 可补充个人需求，让对话更真实
